column13: W360 is dedicated to pioneering market-leading solutions and innovations beyond conventional boundaries, primarily focusing on energy, waste, water, and packaging. Our commitment is rooted in a vision to reshape industries and drive positive environmental impact.

column13: W23 is the dynamic venture capital and innovation fund within the Woolworths Group, leveraging our extensive assets, formidable scale, and industry expertise to forge strategic partnerships. This innovative initiative is at the forefront of driving transformative change, utilising our unique position in the market to invest in and collaborate with startups pioneering groundbreaking solutions in retail and climate technology.

column13: Woolworths embraces cutting-edge waste management solutions with A.C.T. GoTerra, utilising black soldier fly larvae technology. This innovative approach transforms organic waste into a valuable resource, contributing to a sustainable and circular economy. A.C.T. GoTerra's technology harnesses the natural capabilities of black soldier fly larvae to efficiently break down organic matter, offering an eco-friendly alternative for waste disposal.
column20: ACT GoTerra, black soldier fly, larvae technology

column8: The Roxby Downs SA remote store
column13: Woolworths takes a proactive step in waste management through its remote store partnership in Roxby Downs, South Australia. This initiative addresses the unique challenges of waste disposal in remote areas. By collaborating with local stakeholders and leveraging innovative solutions, Woolworths aims to establish efficient waste management practices in the Roxby Downs store.
